website_summaries.verdict: A top-of-the-line model with advanced features that are designed to keep your pool pristine.
pros: The impressively large top-loading cartridge filter along with the variable micron filtration allows this unit to rid your pool of small debris and algae
The continuous rubber tracks are designed to grip better than wheels and help the device climb walls
cons: Care must be taken to untangle the cord after every cleaning as it can knot up on you and cause your cleaner to lose its effectiveness

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I don't get that positive reviews, this does not map the pool and cover every area. What it does do is clean the walls and return to the same corner. My dolphin quantum seems to avoid the deep end of my pool and favors the corner and top of wall and stays there. I have tried moving it to the deep end and it moved back and forth for 30 seconds and then it's like rise of the machines, ignores the intended and does what it wants by returning to 3 foot and climbs the wall. This was a very expensive source of annoyance, I will be seeking a return to Amazon on this one
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Great product. Update 7/29/18. Cleaner is nice but has two major problems. 1. Doesn't pick up harder items, ie gravel. 2. Cord gets continually tangled and does not untangle well. Will tangle up quickly again. Almost rendering the vacuum useless. Certainly is strange that something simple like a swivel cord connection wasn't added to such an expensive, top of the line machine. The no-tangle hassle in the advertising is a complete misrepresentation. Stay away. I liked mine when I first got it. Now I spend as much time untangling the cord as I do vacuuming the pool. The garbage about the programming not allowing it to tangle is a total lie.
customer_reviews.author: Arnietown

customer_reviews.title: No wireless capability
customer_reviews.text: Received today. We had a dolphin premier for four years before that worked great until the motor burned out from track getting stuck on cardboard. I did not know that powersupply was to be directly attached to the electrical outlet. Glad I read now. For th price, I'm not satisfied because I wanted to be able to put on Schedule without having to manually push button. No wifi capability. Dolphin has too many models which make it super confusing to analyze which one we need for us. I think if they were to narrow down their models and have much more clearer explanations on the differences between them all, would be helpful. I
customer_reviews.author: DIYer Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best pool vacuum so far and I have owned many ...
customer_reviews.text: Best pool vacuum so far and I have owned many different types over several years. I like that it is smaller & lighter weight, but works just as well as my older Tiger Shark-style vac. Best features: Top loading filter (this is a major improvement over bottom style). Easy to grab folding handle. Cord has not tangled. Size not as bulky. Lighter weight makes it so much easier to place into & pull from the pool. Does not spill water all over the place like my old cleaner when removing. Overall, so much easier to use. Intelligent design. Does a thorough job. Easily climbs walls. I even like the little blu led light so you know it us running :)
customer_reviews.author: skipper

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing, I couldn't be happier with the performance
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing, I couldn't be happier with the performance. I can't get the Bluetooth to work with my phone but haven't gone into troubleshooting on that yet. Not a big deal for me, the point is this thing is saving me many hours a week cleaning my pool. And it cleaned up a VERY dirty pool.
customer_reviews.author: 853OKG

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Will not clean all the pool or steps. Cord will tangle and deteriorates. Parts fall off.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second robot. I have 20k gallon rectangle pool. I will not get corners or steps....ever. In one year of ownership and after trying resetting and placing in different places I have had no success. Manufacturer does not respond. The cord will get tangled and deteriorate. After one year I have to order another already. The rubber piece fall apart and have to be constantly reattached. The filter screens tear easily. Had to buy new ones first six months. 1.5 years later. Still will not clean all pool or go up steps. Now cord needs replacement as well as flap. Also. Maytronics site will not post all the negative reviews. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: I like it. However
customer_reviews.text: Product performs very well ..I like it. However, I intend to return it because of the frequent tangling of the pressure cord. It can not perform good 30 minutes because the completely tangles and the unit then floats. I have two robotic cleaners. The older one doesn't perform as good as this one but the cord gives me no problem...making it problem free and I only paid $450. With the price of this one..(Approx.$1000), I was curious as to the performance....but the cord is horrible...and I hate it all. I will like to use it more often, but I must have to be there to keep untangling the cord...so upsetting....and I be returning it for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Davison Ejiogu

customer_reviews.title: I do not like mine and warranty is useless
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a zero if I could!!!! the cord has to be constantly untangled and if you don't have a dedicated 110V circuit You are Done!!! I do not like mine and warranty is useless!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good robot.
customer_reviews.text: Filters well with the particulate filter in place. Climbs walls, doesn't do steps. It seems to have a problem with non-flat pool surfaces since the brushes are flat, but it eventually comes around to hit it at an angle that will get it clean. Cartridges are easy to change. Cord does tangle up something wicked if you don't untangle it periodically. I still do have to brush, but less often. I think its main benefit for me is that I have to backflush and clean my DE filter far less than before. Haven't tried the Bluetooth yet because I'm not really sure what it is for.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy unless....
customer_reviews.text: First time through this thing was great. But unless you want to spend $1000 AND THEN another $250 on a freakin cord that doesn’t tangle DO NOT BUY THIS ONE!!! It makes me so mad every time I spend forever untangling the cord ....which doesn’t untangle very good btw. It is the biggest POS you can imagine - how in the heck did Maytronics let this crap come out of their factory? Hey...here’s an idea.....FIRE THE DESIGNER of this hell hole of a machine. $1000 that tangles in less than a cycle....ARE YOU KIDDING ME?
customer_reviews.author: SilverSlonny

customer_reviews.title: why'd I suffer with Polaris for so long
customer_reviews.text: On our 2nd year. A little bleached , but still kickin. Our home pool is huge by most standards, it's 25 YARDS long. Stick "Robbie's " controller at the mid point, and it goes to town. Up the walls, good coverage. Runs when pool pump is off. Minor downside is the cord gets twisted. The programing must always turn one way vs another. Every week or so, need to untwist the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this one an absolutely amazed at the fine particle it collects
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one an absolutely amazed at the fine particle it collects. Polaris would not even come close to this Nautilus quantum. First time I used it I was embarrassed on how much mud looking stuff the filters collected. And very easy to clean. I totally recommend this and you will probably never have to vacuum to waste again
customer_reviews.author: fred roberts

customer_reviews.title: Dolphin
customer_reviews.text: I like the pool cleaner but I have a problem with it every day. The cable gets all tangled . I set the timer and went away for the weekend and when I got home the cable was all tangled & cleaner has rolled over the cable and it was caught in brushes. I paid entirely to high for that to happen. I had an old Dolphin for about 5 years and never had any problems. The old one had a swivel at end end of cable and it never tangled once. Can someone please call me to discuss what I can do about this problem. Thanks. Anna LeJeune 337-207-9746
customer_reviews.author: Anna LeJeune

customer_reviews.title: ... tell you how it works since it arrived looking like a previously owned one
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t tell you how it works since it arrived looking like a previously owned one.
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous

customer_reviews.title: Suction not powerful enough
customer_reviews.text: Given the price ($1000), I really was surprised at how poorly the Quantum performed at cleaning my 20x40 gunite pool I ended up returning it after it failed to pick up grit from the bottom of the pool even after multiple runs -- I felt that the suction motor was simply not powerful enough. I had purchased the Dolphin after my Aquabot Turbo began to die (it would stop randomly after a few minutes of running).
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: I spend more time untangling the cord than If I just vacuumed the pool myself. It also does a terrible job of coverage. It seems to always climb the wall in the same two spots. I do like how easy the basket is to clean. The three Aquabots that I had did a better job cleaning, but they are so flimsy now. This product was a real let down. So much so, that this is the only product that I have ever reviewed.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: I GIVE UP!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pool cleaner and have replaced the power supply/controller twice!! The final controller I received would not always turn on when I pressed the on button. It requires several attempts to get it to turn on. Now the robot it self does not work!! I spent close to $1k for this thing and it is unreliable. Going back to the $100 Jandi vacs.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique E. Calistro

customer_reviews.title: It cleans pretty good but why cheap out?!
customer_reviews.text: This thing cost twice as much as my first car, why not put a swivel on the power cord? It cleans fine and I like the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn P. Regan

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work. Return not so easy.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this did not work. Return posted to my card today. Some hassle getting it dry, repacked and finding UPS store to return. Still need pool cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Merrill Yancey

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very good , can nudge it with a pole net for spots it might miss.
customer_reviews.text: So far works great. I'm turning off my sand filter during robotic use. The sand filter jets prevents robot from scrubbing them. Cord does not get tangled. No problem , cleans algae too. I only run it one cycle at a time , because the electric box becomes very warm, I feel using in back to back timed would damage the power unit. Let your power box cool down before using two times in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Gertrude saunders

customer_reviews.title: Sparkling clean pool
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how well this Dolphin cleaned my pool. The microfine filter cleared out all the little particles that was making my pool cloudy. Easy to use, lightweight and best of all.....easy to clean! I’ve only had this for a week, but i will give it 5 stars for now!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It did fine with leaves and climbing the wall but sometimes it ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it doesn't pick up small particles very well so I have returned it. It did fine with leaves and climbing the wall but sometimes it would actually turn over onto its top when it came down the wall.
customer_reviews.author: ImTheTypeOfGuy

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for one season.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying something that would last. I thought wrong. I kept it cleaned at all times and it only lasted one season and now it's toast. It was great while it worked however, now I'm stuck spending a lot of money again which I'd rather be buying something else. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Reguera

customer_reviews.title: The  tangling of the cord
customer_reviews.text: It cleaned the pool pretty good it did miss a few spots but I could live with that. The major problem is the constant tangling of the cord. It is impossible to straighten out. Have to do that every time I want to use it. After a year it is so crimped.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Zelones

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Gets entangled , and gets stuck , do not buy. Also does not seem to clean very well. Invest you money in something else.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: better then my first Dolphin
customer_reviews.text: Excellant, better then my first Dolphin. Goes up the sides and easy to clean. Covers the pool in no time. Bet its saving on the electricity because of the speed and efficiency. One complaint is the cord. Its too stiff and easy to knott up. Have to unwind frequently. Not a great problem but a nuisance nonetheless. Otherwise I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Sakamoto

customer_reviews.title: Wants to stay in shallow end and climb walls mostly ...
customer_reviews.text: Wants to stay in shallow end and climb walls mostly, debris is in deep end. Customer support is virtually non-existent, supposed to be a smartphone app but will not work and after repeated attempts to contact company I gave up. Had I known I would have bought a less expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Sperry

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner does a great job cleaning and the waste basket is great!!! 3 stars is because Bluetooth was disabled and type of cleaning regard fast or normal was disabled. I returned it and going to get the dolphin Triton the orange and black one where all functions are enabled!
customer_reviews.author: Damien Fairman

customer_reviews.title: Large top open clean box without tangle wire
customer_reviews.text: I had a dolphin pool cleaner for over 20 years. It was a reliable working robot. The new Quantum has a few nice features. The top open with a large clean box is very handing and easy to clean. The wire is floating in the water and don't get to tangle up. The robot do clean the wall, but not steps. Powerful enough for a large ungrounded pool.
customer_reviews.author: George Chao

customer_reviews.title: 000 I would have expected this to work much better than it does
customer_reviews.text: For $1,000 I would have expected this to work much better than it does. It’s going back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not use on a vinyl pool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2018 and while it did a decent job of cleaning, by the end of the season there was noticeable wear to my vinyl liner. Probably works fine on fiberglass or concrete.
customer_reviews.author: 7McDonalds

customer_reviews.title: Does not clean entire pool - misses large parts of ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not clean entire pool - misses large parts of the bottom. No support from company. I wish I had never purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: ToonTowner

customer_reviews.title: RETURNED
customer_reviews.text: Either I got a defect or this unit has NO logic to its software. Tried it several times,left many untouched spots.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Gets the pool clean.
customer_reviews.text: This item is great cleans the pool very well. ,
customer_reviews.author: Chapter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product has been awesome in my gunite pool. Climbs the walls and cleans perfectly. Not having to plug the vac hose into one of my skimmers has been a huge relief. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jackson

customer_reviews.title: over all great cleaner. Really like it
customer_reviews.text: over all great cleaner. Really like it. However the cord does twist. Make sure to take straighten cord every use.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: This product is not worth $100
customer_reviews.text: This product is a joke first one lasted three months on my second one went out one year later buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great on climbing the walls
customer_reviews.text: Worked well except for the control box lights were not working right and I returned the unit. Did a good job of climbing the walls, the jets on the sides and back did a great job of keeping the unit in contact with the walls. Return went thru without a hitch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner but no App available for it.
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great cleaner for us. At time it can miss a few spots but they are usually leaves that get moved around from the water propulsion. It would be nice if the My Dolphin App was available for this unit which it is not. Kind of pointless to have Bluetooth capabilities with no App.
customer_reviews.author: Robbmrp

customer_reviews.title: Superior Pool Equipment----A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pool equipment....a must have for the pool owner that wants a clean pool with no effort. Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Corey G.

customer_reviews.title: Huge debris basket capacity
customer_reviews.text: Quantum works great. The basket holding the debris is huge and very easy to clean. The power cable gets tangled quite a bit, but it doesn't seem to hinder the operation of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: TC Racer

customer_reviews.title: Pool Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. No more hiring expensive maintenance crew. Takes a couple of run times to clean my 25k gal pool. Love it and highly recommend for vinyl liner. Cleans side too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Cleans the pool as expected. Very easy clean this vacuum. Very pleased. Highly recommend this pool vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It cleans the entire pool and only seems ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It cleans the entire pool and only seems to briefly get stuck on drains, then works it's way off. Other robots failed on these areas. Doesn't clean the steps that well, but seems none of them do, Like the easy access top loading cartridge. Very easy to clean. The unit does not seem heavy to me. When you bring it to the side you just lift it a little slow to drain the water. The changeable filter screens are a nice touch. They are easy to switch to either handle larger debris and leaves to fine particles. If it had cleaned my steps well, I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best pool cleaner. It does clean the pool and you don't have to watch it.
customer_reviews.author: Tln1960

customer_reviews.title: No blue tooth
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned the pool and did good job but was extremely disappointed to find out this $1000 machine Dosent have blue tooth ? Overall I’m happy just. Felt for the kind of money I paid should come with blue tooth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one summer
customer_reviews.text: Worked for one summer. Will update after I check customer service out.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work manufacturer defect
customer_reviews.text: Product came when it was supposed to but the brain on led panel only half worked and robot didn’t work properly probably because of it so sent back to amazon
customer_reviews.author: Thames August

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY FROM THIS POOL CLEANER
customer_reviews.text: STAY AWAY FROM THIS POOL CLEANER ,IT SIMPLY DOESN’T WORK!!!!!!!!! HAS NEVER WORKED RIGHT SINCE DAY ONE!!!!! IM A LOYAL DOLPHIN USER. THIS IS JUNK!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: RCW

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not what I expected. doesn't clean as I thought it should
customer_reviews.author: Kay Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity
customer_reviews.text: The debris basket is large and easy to clean out. Like this much better than the DX4 I have.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean compared to the old Doplhin 4/5. So far an excellent cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H. Kubitskey

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. It cleans everything. The filter basket is a breeze to clean. Would buy again. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: T. Crose

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished NOT NEW
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed and returned this. As soon as we opened it we realized it’s not new! Scuffs, dirty and bent tires. Clearly refurbished but priced as new.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Unit works very well. Doesn't get stuck on main drain like my old tiger shark. Cleans pool quickly and is very light. And the filter bin is on top making it very easy and quick to clean.
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pool cleaner I have owned. drop it in and let it go..........
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Its not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The cord is one huge mess it continually tangles so that the unit wont roam the entire pool.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Smart Pool Vacum Bot
customer_reviews.text: Time of Delivery is awesome and the product was exactly what was described. Product works superbly. Very Happy!!!!!!!!! here are some before and after pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Myers

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job of cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job of cleaning, but can get stuck at the drain cover. I really wanted to use the remote control feature because if it misses some area or if you want to make it to go over a particular area again, you just have to wait until it it comes there automatically. It has a large bluetooth indicator on the control panel, so I thought being a newer, higher end Maytronics robot, it would certainly work with the iPhone app. The website for the app indicates that it should work with all of the models. But turns out that bluetooth is disabled on this model.
customer_reviews.author: MyCartIsEmpty

customer_reviews.title: It is working well
customer_reviews.text: I like this , It's cute and do he's job well~ i wish it has bluetooth option though
customer_reviews.author: Jin Hyeong Kim

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well easy to lift but have to go to it and lift it out so try to shut it down in the shallow end of the pool
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: cleans nicely and doesn't rely on the pump
customer_reviews.text: Have a lot of trees in my yard, and this does the trick, cleans nicely and doesn't rely on the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far unimpressed.  Not worth the money yet
customer_reviews.text: I had this so far for a few weeks and right now it is not worth the money paid for it. Is not cleaning the leaves off the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome. Just need to know when to buy extra ...
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome. Just need to know when to buy extra filters. The unit is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: product would not work right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Product would not power on right out of the box. Manufacturer customer service referred me to the vendor, Pool Express. I was forced to leave a voicemail when I called Pool Express on a Friday afternoon and will most likely have to wait out the weekend for a response. Not happy with the product or customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to use and does a great job cleaning our pool.
customer_reviews.author: John Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I like the robot
customer_reviews.text: I like the robot, but it couldn't do my whole pool with the existing power cord length. The distance to the Power Supply from my Pool House to the edge of the pool is 32 feet. The pool is 36 feet long. I definitely needed an extension cord. The power supply is on a 20 amp GFI circuit. I added a 15 foot 20 amp extension cord. That worked fine. If the robot ever got snagged and somehow dragged the cord, the connection would be broken in a possible three places on the power supply line. Thanks for the confirmation on the use of an extension cord by another reviewer.
customer_reviews.author: JR Caron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner. Does a good job on steps and the pool walls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST I'VE EVER OWNED
customer_reviews.text: We are fortunate to have two homes. One in the Midwest and one in California. In California pool men are abundant. However, in the Midwest they are rare due to the short season. Thus, because of that I'm the pool man!!!!! This is Quantum is unreal. It did take two or three runs to figure the dynamics of our lagoon shaped pool....after that it doesn't miss anything. In regard to the warranty issue..call them, as I did, they will register for you FREE OF CHARGE. Filters are so easy clean, the unit weighs only approximately 14 lbs. I may fire my pool man California and replace him the Quantum.
customer_reviews.author: MJH

customer_reviews.title: I may have just got a bad unit. I do like the large top load ...
customer_reviews.text: After 6 attempts to clean the pool I returned the unit. Only moved around in the same path, turned upside down and would work to right itself with the jets and overall did not work to clean the pool. I may have just got a bad unit. I do like the large top load basket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mostly pleased with performance...
customer_reviews.text: Mostly pleased with the operation, though it does not clean the entire bottom of my random-shaped gunite pool. Also, there is a feature on the control unit that supposedly allows a single sweep of the BOTTOM ONLY. I contacted customer service only to discover that that feature is disabled on this model. Nowhere in the shoddy instructions was this mentioned and I was VERY DISAPPOINTED that this wasn't available, since it would cut the cleaning time in half by not climbing up the walls. Otherwise, I've been quite pleased with its functionality and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon reviewer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to connect and use
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to connect and use. The cord has not tangled on me yet. My only complaint is that is does wander aimlessly around the pool, and after running for over 2 hours, there were still missed spots on the bottom and walls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I've only run this three times but the ease of use and amount of dirt and debris it picked up is impressive. Very happy we splurged on this model.
customer_reviews.author: Deby Hill

product_meta.title: DOLPHIN Quantum Robotic Inground Pool Cleaner
product_meta.description: The 2017 Dolphin Quantum takes its place at the top of the Dolphin line-up and in the top echelon of robotic pool cleaners. It's easy to see why the new Dolphin Quantum is the answer to the needs of pool owners everywhere. With groundbreaking PowerJet 3D Mobility and a level of efficiency never seen before, everything comes back into play. It’s about a new benchmark. We are always looking forward. Not sideways, never back. So we started from scratch. And we gave everything to make the newest Dolphin even better. In doing so, the next Dolphin can do more, deliver more and consumes less power than ever before. Highly efficient, state-of-the-art DC motors and an ingenious PowerJet 3D Mobility deliver an exceptional user experience while reducing energy use up to 87%. In a class by itself, the Dolphin Quantum was designed from the ground up to be easier to own and easier to operate.
feature_bullets: Massive 400 square inch top-loading cartridge filter . The largest ever in a pool robot.
Hypergrip Continuous Rubber Tracks for superior wall climging - leave wheeled cleaners in it's wake.
Variable Micron Filtration traps the smallest fine debris and even algae
SmartNav 2.0 Efficient Robotic Navigation. Gone are the days of your robot wondering around aimlessly.
Hyperbrush Dual Scrubbing Brushes + Power Jet 3D Vectored Thrust for a deeper clean and improved mobility

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars126 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
